1.12.2.1.3.0:
+ Dispenser module: place block and spawn items!
+ Sonar module: make your boats follow streams!
+ Icebreaker module!
+ Creative mode engine module (requires no fuel)
+ Diving module: Breathe underwater next to the boat!
* Reinforced the boat, it should be able to go on lava now.
* Boat speed is now configurable in the engine GUI.
1.12.2.1.2.1:
+ Added configuration file
* Fishing rods are now damaged when used in the fishing module
* Added configuration options for fishing speed and rod removal before breaking
